author: yihui-lai
body:
#### PR description:

- added pulse Shape 208, it is a resulting pulse from phase scan of MC Digi of Shape 206.

#### Link to related slides: 

  - https://indico.cern.ch/event/936151/#110-mc-hbhe-signal-shape-time
  - https://indico.cern.ch/event/935592/#3-mc-hbhe-signal-shape-time-sc
  - https://indico.cern.ch/event/943042/#5-mc-hbhe-signal-shape-time-sc
  - https://indico.cern.ch/event/943042/#6-2021-mcreco-with-pulse-shape

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.
title: HCAL MC: adding pulse shape 208 for signal reconstruction
